div.ab: The eighth year of Imperator Caesar Trajanus Hadrianus Augustus ï¿½ at Tebtunis in the division of Polemon of the Arsinoite nome. Paopis son of Paopis the younger son of Paopis, exempted priest of the [.]4th generation, Persian of the Epigone, aged about 35 years, having a scar on the right arm, that he, the acknowledging party, has received from him, Maron, forthwith from hand to hand out of his house a loan of the capital sum of 120 silver drachmas bearing interest, and the acknowledging party Paopis is bound to repay to Maron the capital sum of the loan, 120 silver drachmas, and the interest, in the month Mecheir of the coming ninth year of Hadrianus the Lord without any delay or excuse, Maron having the right of execution upon Paopis and all his property as if in accordance with a legal decision. (2nd hand) I, Paopis son of Paopis, acknowledge to have received from Maron a loan of one hundred twenty silver drachmas bearing interest which I will repay in the month Mecheir of the ninth year without delay as is above written. (3rd hand) Maron, the acknowledgement has been made. (4th hand) Registered by the record-office in Tebtunis. (On the verso) Acknowledgement of Paopis about a loan of 120 drachmas from Maron.
